summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2052, for the improvement of the Alley in Block Sixty-six (66), A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley from Pike Street to Pine Street, and between Seventh Avenue and Eighth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 20604, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
